General.Name: British and American Investment Trust PLC
General.Description: British & American Investment Trust plc is a publically owned investment manager. The firm manages equity mutual fund for its clients. It invests in public equity markets of United Kingdom. The firm invests predominantly in investment trusts. British & American Investment Trust plc was founded in 1947 and is based in London, United Kingdom.
General.Address: Wessex House, London, United Kingdom, SW1X 8ND
